text:
Big Nerd Ranch | Junior iOS Developer | Atlanta,GA | Onsite

Big Nerd Ranch specializes in developing business-building mobile and web apps for our clients. We also teach students what we've learned through our signature immersive bootcamps, and every year we release new books in our best-selling series of Big Nerd Ranch Guides.

We are looking for an entry level full-time iOS engineer to join the team. No professional experience required, but must be willing to learn and work hard. Exposure to architecture, design, configuration, the Xcode environment, Objective-C and Swift a plus. Learn more here https://www.bignerdranch.com/about-us/careers/
